description: Lists your network instances. A network instance is a single network created in Amazon Web Services TNB that can be deployed and on which life-cycle operations (like terminate, update, and delete) can be performed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was created.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: nsInstanceDescription
nested_items.description: Human-readable description of the network instance.

nested_items.name: nsInstanceName
nested_items.description: Human-readable name of the network instance.

nested_items.name: nsState
nested_items.description: The state of the network instance.

nested_items.name: nsdId
nested_items.description: ID of the network service descriptor in the network package.

nested_items.name: nsdInfoId
nested_items.description: ID of the network service descriptor in the network package.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
